about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a Senior Frontend Developer with a passion for creating beautiful, functional, and accessible web applications. With over 8 years of experience, I specialize in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS architectures. My approach combines technical excellence with thoughtful design to deliver products that users love.
